title: famososMuertos
author: famososMuertos
content: We cannot see beyond the present, the Bitcoin is established or prolonged based to individuals, bitcoin is technology ( the arm)and success lies in the longevity of the premises, then improve them and manage to develop for their sustainability.You must remember that we got here (the ever cyclical today) because of the enthusiasm of the first bitcoiners.That's just one thing...there's a lot to do beforehand to get somewhere in the long run, so today is the real success of Bitcoin.
